issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table View (layout 5), I noticed that two of the images in the table are not rendering. I checked the URLs listed in the .js and they functioned fine from a browser. The two lines are:

'http://t2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:-iOGlc8ww3Zx8M:http://www.arukereso.hu/akciostippek/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/apple-iphone.jpg',
'http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:T2pHhXb3a80U1M:http://hirkep.wapzona.hu/2008/07/28/apple_touch.jpg'

 
Steps to reproduce:
1) Build KS with 1.7.2 rcb4d2d0e
2) Install on iPad 2
3) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table View (layout 5)
4) Check the table for missing images

Result:
Two images are missing from the tableview

Expected:
No missing imagesw

Notes:
Also occurs when same KS built with 1.7.1
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table View (layout 5) has images missing from tableview
fields.environment: iPad 2 (4.3.3) and iPad 2 (4.3.2), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.1.201106171427, SDK 1.7.2 (rcb4d2d0e)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
